entry.title: Project categories?
entry.summary: The discussion highlights an inquiry about the necessity of joining a group to participate in discussions on silent payments, contrasting it with the ability to reply directly in other contexts such as implementation working groups related to block relays. The individual expresses a preference for creating an open platform where participants can contribute without the prerequisite of membership, underlining a misunderstanding of the platform's functionalities rather than an intentional exclusion. The primary motivation behind forming a working group is articulated as a desire to categorize various topics under a unified umbrella, aiming for a more organized and focused discourse. This approach reflects both a learning curve in understanding the platform's mechanics and a commitment to fostering open, inclusive dialogues on relevant subjects.
